message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
I'll take the lead, Alice. You can't beat my offer!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with the whole pie!
I'm not backing down, Bob. Let's be reasonable and split it closer to 60/40.
You're getting bold, Alice. I'll give you a better deal, but don't think I'm going to get taken advantage of!
